name: 14-monster-blog
description: Set up the project. You’ll build off of the previous project by creating new GitHub issues and adding a style sheet. Set up the template engine. You’ll install Handlebars and configure Express to use it as its template engine. Create the homepage template. You’ll create a Handlebars template for the homepage, populated with dummy data. Populate the template with Sequelize data. You’ll use a previously defined Sequelize query to populate the homepage with real data.
